explains: adj. 从前的；旧式的；资深的

sentences.en: He likes to look at film of old-time players.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢看那些以前运动员的影片。

sentences.en: The scene inside the Home Depot on Weyman Avenue here would give the old-time American craftsman pause.
sentences.cn: 威曼大道家得宝内的场景会让这位美国老派工匠驻足。

sentences.en: In short, VCRs were sort of like an old-time TiVo.
sentences.cn: 简单的说，录像机就是类似老式留言电话的一种东西。
